name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 一键添加包裹插件 - WePost 全民代运

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 直接在淘宝、天猫、1688、小米有品、京东等购物平台上一键添加包裹信息。只需点击“添加包裹”，输入部分包裹信息，确认后保存即可。WePost 全民代运，全马最大的中国集运专家 － 用心为您提供最真诚的服务和最全民的价格
short.en_US: Enables users to easily add in parcel to our website within a simple click from Taobao, Tmall, 1688, YouPin, JD etc. After clicking…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WePost 全民代运，全马最大的中国集运专家 － 用心为您提供最真诚的服务和最全民的价格。

【 空运和海运 】
不管是淘宝，天猫还是京东的商品，WePost都能帮你运送到马来西亚和新加坡各地。
空运最低 RM 5.30 / 0.5KG , 海运最低RM 3 / 1KG。

【 一键添加包裹 】
不管是淘宝还是天猫的已买的宝贝，我们都支持一键添加包裹。
用户只需点击“添加包裹”，输入部分包裹信息，确认后保存即可。

【 编辑已添加包裹 】
点击已添加的包裹，即可对包裹资料进行更改，然后保存完成。

【 一键浏览主页 】
点击浏览器右侧的WePost图标，即会出现小窗口显示WePost的主页，用户可进行任何操作。

【 关注我们 】
官网：https://www.wepost.com.my
FB：https://facebook.com/wepost.com.my
Insta：https://www.instagram.com/wepost.com.my
Twitter：https://twitter.com/WePostLogistics

【 联络我们 】
客服：support@wepost.com.my
合作：choong@wepost.com.my

非常感谢所有使用我们APP应用。
有你们的支持，我们会继续努力做到最好，专注做一个最全民的集运专家！
long.en_US:
WePost is the largest China Cross Border Logistic Expert in Malaysia, and always work hard in order to provide quality services with the most affordable price for our valuable customers. 

Air Freight and Sea Freight. 
WePost helps you to ship your goods purchased from Taobao, Tmall and JD.com to all over Malaysia and Singapore. Our Air Freight service offers the lowest rate at RM5.30 / 0.5KG, while Sea Freight offers the lowest rate at RM3 / 1KG. 

One Click Add Parcel
We support One Click Add Parcel feature for the goods you purchased from Taobao and Tmall. Just click on [Add Parcel], and fill up the parcel’s details, then confirm and save.  

Editable Instocked Parcel
For the parcels that are already added into the Parcel list, you are still able to edit the parcel’s details just by clicking on the Parcel‘s Tracking Number.

One Click View WePost
Click on the Wepost logo at the right side of the browser,  Wepost home page will be shown in a pop-up window that enable users to use all the features. 

Follow Us
Official Webpage: https://www.wepost.com.my
Facebook：https://facebook.com/wepost.com.my
Insta：https://www.instagram.com/wepost.com.my
Twitter：https://twitter.com/WePostLogistics

Contact Us 
Customer Service: support@wepost.com.my
Collaboration: choong@wepost.com.my


We are grateful and thank you for using our Application. With all your support, we will strive our best to become the top Cross Border Logistics Expert in Malaysia!
